Name: Actions/Search%20Groups.md
Purpose: Action for recommendation of groups with a given query in the search box

Name: Actions/Get%20Groups.md
Purpose: Action to get groups for a given search query.

Name: Actions/Get%20Images%20for%20Group.md
Purpose: Action to fetch the images of a group when a certain group is selected

Name: Actions/Load%20More%20Groups.md
Purpose: Action to load more groups when the user reaches the end of the page

Name: Actions/Load%20More%20Images.md
Purpose: Action to load more images when the user reaches the end of the page

Name: Actions/Make%20group%20favorite.md
Purpose: Action to make a particular group favorite

Name: Actions/Remove%20Group%20Favorite.md
Purpose: Action to remove a particular group from favorites

Name: Actions/Make%20image%20favorite.md
Purpose: Action to make a particular image favorite

Name: Actions/Remove%20Image%20Favorite.md
Purpose: Action to remove a particular image from favorites

Name: Actions/Select%20Group.md
Purpose: Action to select a particular group to load its images
